titles.title: A bill for the relief of Elliott Roosevelt.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/11/1987--Introduced. Deems the specified disability of a named individual, for the purpose of determining his eligibility for veterans' wartime disability compensation, to be a disability resulting from personal injury suffered or disease contracted in the line of duty.
